statements: SELECT * FROM player_inventory;
SELECT player_name, total_items FROM player_inventory WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT item_name FROM item_owned WHERE player_id = 2 ORDER BY item_id DESC;
SELECT player_name, total_items FROM player_inventory WHERE total_items > 10 ORDER BY total_items ASC;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(item_id) AS total_items_owned FROM item_owned GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_items_owned > 5;
SELECT player_name, total_items FROM player_inventory WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT item_name FROM item_owned WHERE player_id = 2 ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT player_name, item_name, total_items FROM player_inventory JOIN item_owned ON player_inventory.player_id = item_owned.player_id WHERE player_inventory.total_items > 10;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(item_id) AS total_items_owned FROM item_owned GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_name, SUM(total_items) AS total_items_owned FROM player_inventory GROUP BY player_name HAVING total_items_owned > 5;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_level > 10;
SELECT * FROM items WHERE item_type = 'weapon';
SELECT player_name, players.player_level, item_name FROM players JOIN items ON players.player_id = items.owner_id;
SELECT * FROM players ORDER BY player_level DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_level < 5;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE player_level > 5;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_level = 10;
SELECT item_name, item_type FROM items WHERE owner_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT player_name, item_name, item_type FROM players p JOIN items i ON p.player_id = i.owner_id;
SELECT player_id, player_name, COUNT(item_id) AS num_items FROM players LEFT JOIN items ON players.player_id = items.owner_id GROUP BY player_id, player_name;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM players ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT item_name FROM items WHERE item_id = 5;
SELECT player_id, item_id, quantity FROM player_inventory WHERE item_id < 10;
SELECT player_name AS Name, item_name AS Item FROM players JOIN player_inventory ON players.player_id = player_inventory.player_id ORDER BY player_name ASC, item_name DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_id FROM players WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT item_name, item_id FROM items WHERE item_id = 10;
SELECT player_name, item_name, quantity FROM players JOIN player_inventory ON players.player_id = player_inventory.player_id JOIN items ON player_inventory.item_id = items.item_id;

SELECT DISTINCT player_name, item_name FROM players JOIN player_inventory ON players.player_id = player_inventory.player_id JOIN items ON player_inventory.item_id = items.item_id WHERE players.player_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT player_id, COUNT(item_id) AS total_items FROM player_inventory GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY total_items DESC;
SELECT * FROM player;
SELECT item_name, item_description FROM item;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM item_category ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM player;
SELECT player_name, item_name, quantity FROM player_inventory JOIN item ON player_inventory.item_id = item.item_id;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player WHERE player_id = 5;
SELECT item_name, item_description, category_name FROM item JOIN item_category ON item.item_id = item_category.item_id;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(item_id) AS total_items FROM player_inventory GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_items > 3;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_level > 5;
SELECT player_name, guild_name FROM players ORDER BY guild_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_quantity FROM items WHERE item_quantity < 10;
SELECT player_name, log_description FROM players JOIN player_logs ON players.player_id = player_logs.player_id;
SELECT player_name, player_level, guild_name FROM players WHERE player_level > 50;
SELECT * FROM items WHERE item_quantity BETWEEN 10 AND 100 ORDER BY item_name ASC;

SELECT player_name, item_name, quantity_owned FROM players p INNER JOIN inventory inv ON p.player_id = inv.player_id LEFT JOIN items i ON inv.item_id = i.item_id WHERE player_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY quantity_owned DESC;

SELECT p.player_name, il.log_description, il.log_date FROM players p INNER JOIN player_logs il ON p.player_id = il.player_id WHERE il.log_date >= '2022-01-01' AND il.log_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY il.log_date DESC;
SELECT i.item_name, ic.category_name FROM items i LEFT JOIN item_categories ic ON i.item_type = ic.category_id WHERE i.item_type IS NOT NULL ORDER BY i.item_name, ic.category_name DESC;
